description: Another dark guild that appears in the Tower of Heaven arc that are known for being unmatched in their number of successful assassinations. The only known members, the team Trinity Raven, participated in Jellal Fernandes`s Heaven`s Game against the Fairy Tail members. The guild seems to be extremely powerful, as all three members were on the same or stronger level than the Fairy Tail Guild`s Team Natsu members, including Erza Scarlet who is an S-class mage.
name: Death`s Head Caucus
